review: It’s like any other business area, highly congested, difficult to find parking in case one is self driving

title: Sanjay Place Shopping center of Agra
review: Sanjay Place is located in the centre of Agra. It has numerous shops ranging from ready-made garments to consumer electronics.There are large complexes dedicated to mobile phones and access nearby which house nearly a hundred shops and deal in wholesale and retail sales.

title: Shopping center
review: The sanjay shopping center has many shops and you can find many more but it is very crowded place and noisy.
